sentences: Me arutlesime suures vaates probleemi lahendamist.
Kunstniku stiili võib kirjeldada suures joontes.
context: The word 'suures' is the inessive case singular form of the adjective 'suur' (big/large). In this context, it's used in the phrase 'suures joontes' which means 'in broad outlines' or 'in general terms'. This expression refers to looking at something from a high-level perspective without getting into details. The dictionary definition confirms this usage by explaining it as 'jämeda(te)s joon(t)es' (in thick lines/broad strokes).
